document.full_text: r&b singer chris brown apologized for throwing a tantrum over renewed questions about his assault on ex-girlfriend rihanna, but said he felt exploited and "wanted to release the anger inside me."
document.title: chris brown sorry for outburst, album heads to no.1
lines_and_colors: r&b singer chris brown apologized for throwing a tantrum over renewed questions about his assault on ex-girlfriend rihanna, but said he felt exploited and "wanted to release the anger inside me."
